column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I love this place! I actually don't even like pizza (I know
column2: I'm weird) but my sister insisted we try deep dish during our first time in Chicago so we ended up here. We ordered the Lou and O-M-G! The Parmesan crust had me craving this pizza for days! Three kinds of cheese
column4: and fresh tomatoes add to the awesomeness.
